H0.text: Decomposer → Consumer → Producer is the diagram that correctly shows the flow of energy in a food chain.

H1.text: Producer → Consumer → Decomposer is the diagram that correctly shows the flow of energy in a food chain.

H2.text: Consumer -> Producer -> Decomposer is the diagram that correctly shows the flow of energy in a food chain.

H3.text: Producer → Decomposer → Consumer is the diagram that correctly shows the flow of energy in a food chain.

A6.text: carnivores eat the herbivores or decomposers that consume the autotrophic energy.
